Package de.japi.components.layout

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Japi2FixLayout
    A simple layout to lay-out components at a fixed position.
    Japi2GridLayout
    This class wraps the GridLayout to provide a workaround for a nasty Swing bug: if a panel with the GridLayout is set twice to the same column or row value the component needs to be revalidated.
    Japi2HorizontalFlowLayout
    A custom FlowLayout extension for horizontal flow.
    Japi2VerticalFlowLayout
    A custom FlowLayout extension for vertical flow.
